original_text: All the angels were standing around the throne, and around the leaders and the four beings. The angels all bent down so that their faces touched the ground. They worshipped God who was on the throne in front of them.
korean_text: 모든 천사가 보좌와 장로들과 네 생물의 주위에 서 있다가 보좌 앞에 엎드려 얼굴을 대고 하나님께 경배하여

sentences.original_text: All the angels were standing around the throne
sentences.korean_translation: 모든 천사들이 보좌 주위에 서 있었습니다

sentences.original_text: and around the leaders and the four beings
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 지도자들과 네 생물 주위에도 있었습니다

sentences.original_text: so that their faces touched the ground
who was on the throne in front of them
